description: This procurement is a request for proposal for am putting up stanchions in accordance with Annex A. This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods.
duration_in_months: With ending date of (2022-10-09), hence duration is estimated at 15 days.  Though, PRE END DATE IS NULL, estimate duration cannot be estimated
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## G9292-231843: Stanchions 

### Details
- **Number and Title**: G9292-231843 Stanchions 
- **Reference Number**: WS3626268045-Doc3664436938
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Publication Date**: September 15, 2022

### Tender Information
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 3, 2022, 2 p.m. EST
- **Tender Status**: Cancelled
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Limited Tendering Reason**: None

### Requirements
- **Stanchions**: In accordance with Annex A
- **Condition for Award**: Conditionally limited to Canadian goods

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact**: Hiltz, Jackson (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
- **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14089664?extsite=MTQwODk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14089664?extsite=MTQwODk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
- **Attachment**: None

Please note, this tender has been cancelled, and no bids will be considered.  Company staff will not be able to assist with any questions.  Only bids submitted by 2 p.m. EST on October 3rd, 2022, will be considered for this contract.  All bids received after this time will be excluded from consideration. There are no attachments for this tender.
